name: Pretty in Pink
_source: speak;Pikno;Ah! Oh, Roag. I'm just training.
speak;Pikno;Well... Normally it means nobody's watching me.
speak;Pikno;Weird? Well... I'd rather not be feeling self conscious.|Such feelings are a hinderance in combat.
speak;Roag;Gurl, I know I'd train in front of everyone! Show them I am, indeed, FABULOUS!
speak;Pikno;I wish I had your confidence...
speak;Roag;Oop... I didn't mean to make ya feel worse...|But I know that you can slay the day away! You should train with me next time!|I'll take any unwanted attention away from ya anyway!
speak;Pikno;Heh, I guess I could do that.
speak;Roag;We can be... the Pink Protectors! Yasss!
speak;Pikno;Sounds good to me. Thank you, Roag.
